title: [Bug]: Upload/Change Image is showing different language output in Ubuntu OS
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

Uploade image popup not showing the data properly

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.13.1

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Go to any groups or chat
2. Try to upload an image
3. View the image upload dialog box
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/06932b7c-8924-415b-811a-f442a22e7c63)
